application_description.message: This application connects your EV3 to Open Roberta Lab via USB cable.

infotext_plugin.message: Connect the EV3 to your computer via the USB cable. It will be detected automatically after a few seconds.

infotext_connect.message: Click on »connect« to connect your robot to Open Roberta Lab.

infotext_tokencopy.message: Type in the token under robots>connect in the Open Roberta Lab, by using »copy« and »paste«. It is valid for 5 minutes.

infotext_runprogram.message: You are able to run your programs on the EV3 now. Do not forget to plug in the cable again, after your program execution has finished.

window_confirmclose.message: If you close the application, your robot is no longer connected to Open Roberta Lab.

window_interneterror.message: The internet connection to Open Roberta Lab is lost.

about.message: This application is part of the Open Roberta Lab, which is an Open-Source programming platform, developed by Fraunhofer Institute IAIS within the initiative »Roberta Learning with Robots« version 1.3.0.

window_updaterequired.message: The firmware on the robot is outdated. Please update it now. Therefor, click on »OK«. The programs on your EV3 will persist. Afterwards, the menu will automatically perform a restart.

window_updatesuccess.message: The update was successful. You can connect your robot to Open Roberta Lab again.

window_updatefail.message: The update has failed. Connect your robot to Open Roberta Lab and try again.

noti_timeout_msg.message: The token is expired. Try again.
